name: I'm Old Fashioned
comments: "I'm Old Fashioned" is a 1942 song composed by Jerome Kern, with lyrics written by Johnny Mercer.
I listen to this track with a glass of wine and forget about the world for a while. Love it!
Blue Train is my Easy Sunday morning album. [2]

old fashioned maybe that's why when I press that heart to indicate that I love this track it never shows up. technology never works for me. I'm old fashioned. I love John Coltrane's playing maybe that's because I'm old fashioned. That will never go out of fashion. Not interested in fashion only quality!!!
One of my favourite Coltrane tracks. Beautiful and captivating.
I'm old fashioned too... Blue Train is my Easy Sunday morning album.
this track is like an old wine. it only gets better with every year, every day and every listen.
A shorter version with only Coltrane taking a solo would have been preferable.
who knew being old fashioned could be so soul pleasingly peaceful...and oh so romantic...?  thanks john...
beautiful...absolutely beautiful...john you are so loved and so missed...here's hoping you can still feel the love your genius invokes...RIP

the perfect definition of breathtaking. [3]
and also the perfect definition of breath delivering... :)
